summary: ABS FAILED WITH VEHICLE IN MOTION. ABS MOTOR/PUMP RAN WITH THE VEHICLE AND SHUT IT DOWN. DEALER REPLACED  THE ABS MODULE TO CORRECT THE FAULT.  DEALER PERSONNEL COMMENTED THAT THIS WAS A RATHER PREVALENT FAILURE MODE ON THIS MODEL TRUCK.  DEALER ALSO STATED THAT THE REPLACEMENT ABS MODULE WAS AN IMPROVED DESIGN, AND THE HAD NOT EXPERIENCED ANY FAILURES OF THE IMPROVED MODULES.  CHEVROLET CUSTOMER ASSISTANCE REFUSES TO ACKNOWLEDGE THAT A PROBLEM EXISTS AND WILL  TAKE NO ACTION TO CORRECT THIS DEFICIENCY. *TS  ***DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12-12-02 CUT OVER TO ARTEMIS***763173
